name: Aylesbury Magistrates' Court and Family Court

facilities.description: The car park is unavailable for public access.

facilities.description: The building has hearing enhancement facilities available by prior arrangement.  Please contact the Court office by telephone or email if necessary.

facilities.description: Baby changing facilities are available in the disabled toilets on the ground floor

facilities.description: This building has level access to the building entrance, and court room.

facilities.description: Video conference facilities excluding prison to court video links
facilities.name: Video facilities
